titleStmt.title: A collection of sermons ... together with Notes upon Jonah / by Thomas Fuller.
Sermons. Selections
titleStmt.author: Fuller, Thomas, 1608-1661.

notesStmt.note: Each pt. has special t.p. and separate paging; pt. 1 dated: 1656; pts. 2-4: 1655; pt. 5: 1657.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
Pt. 2, p. 3-10 are missing in the filmed copy. Signatures D-E photographed from the British Library copy and inserted at the end.
(from t.p.) 1. The best employment -- 2. A gift for God alone -- 3. The true penitent -- 4. The best act of oblivion.
